title: 01/20/21 DPS Hour 2 Bob Kravitz
itunes:title: 01/20/21 DPS Hour 2 Bob Kravitz
description:
Bob Kravitz talked to Dan about deflate gate. Bob stands by what he wrote at the time when he wrote that the Patriots was under investigation for deflating footballs.
